tool_description: Retrieves and processes credit bureau information including credit scores, payment history, and credit utilization for underwriting purposes.

ssn.description: Social Security Number for credit lookup

full_name.description: Full legal name of the applicant

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth in ISO format

bureau_preference.description: Preferred credit bureau (experian, equifax, transunion, all)

error_messages: Invalid SSN format: SSN must be 9 digits in XXX-XX-XXXX format
Credit file not found: No credit history found for provided information
Identity verification failed: Provided information does not match credit bureau records
Credit freeze detected: Credit file is frozen and cannot be accessed
Bureau service unavailable: Selected credit bureau service is temporarily unavailable
usage: Provide ssn, full_name, date_of_birth, and current_address for credit lookup. Optionally specify bureau_preference. Returns comprehensive credit information and risk assessment.

credit_grade.description: Credit grade classification (excellent, good, fair, poor)

derogatory_marks.description: Number of negative items on credit report

credit_age_months.description: Age of oldest credit account in months
